pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Dart Sass is the primary implementation of Sass, written in Dart.
This package builds dart-sass from source using the Dart SDK, providing: - The sass command-line tool compiled to a native executable - Full Sass/SCSS language support with latest features - Superior performance compared to the deprecated Ruby implementation
This is the reference implementation and the actively maintained version of Sass. It has replaced the deprecated Ruby implementation (dev-ruby/sass) and provides better performance and more up-to-date language features.
